David Cameron said he was`` very sorry'' Andy Coulson was going but added that he could understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so. `` Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government,'' he said. US state department spokesman Simon Cowell Crowley, speaking to reporters in Washington yesterday, too indicated that Cameron Munter had called on Asif Ali Zardari to release the arrested official. We continue to make clear to the government of Pakistan that our diplomat has diplomatic immunity; in our view,( he) was acting in self-defence and should be released... Ambassador Cameron Munter met... with President Asif Ali Zardari to continue to make that point, he said. Reports also suggested that this fresh irritant in bilateral relations could affect Asif Ali Zardari 's upcoming visit to Washington. has 25 touchdown passes and just five interceptions on third down.`` Aaron Rodgers 's a special athlete,'' Green Bay coach Mike McCarthy said after the Packers defeated Chicago 21-14 in the NFC championship game. He can do everything you want at the quarterback position. Can make all the throws. Very smart. Has great command of the quarterback position. And he can run. Sunday, Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell ( R-Ky.) told host David Letterman Gregory that he did not`` have much to add'' to what Hillary Clinton had said on how the administration was handling the uprising. I don't have any criticism of Barack Obama or Secretary Hillary Clinton at this point, Mitch McConnell added after he was pressed by Gregory.`` I mean, they know full well that we can't give the Egyptians advice about who their leadership is.
